With practice, cutting food can be safe, fun, and easy, and is a skill that is well worth developing for anyone who prepares food.

data.fullContent: Cutting is one of the most basic kitchen preparation skills. By far the most common utensil for this is a chef's knife, although a paring knife and others are also used. With practice, cutting food can be safe, fun, and easy, and is a skill that is well worth developing for anyone who prepares food.
data.answer: 切菜是最基本的厨房准备技能之一。到目前为止，最常见的器具是厨师刀，虽然削皮刀和其他也被使用。通过练习，切食物可以是安全的，有趣的，简单的，而且是一项值得任何准备食物的人发展的技能。
